member.name: M:ArrayManipulation.ArrayExtension.FindBalanceIndex(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Finds the maxIndex of the balance.
member.returns: Returns maxIndex or null if maxIndex not found.

member.name: M:ArrayManipulation.ArrayExtension.FindMaximumItem(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Finds the maximum item in the given array.
member.returns: Returns a value of maximum element.
